keyMoments.title: Attack on Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: The Caribou Pirates attack the Straw Hat crew underwater, attempting to board the Thousand Sunny.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's attempted attack backfires when Momoo abandons them and the Kraken destroys their ship.

keyMoments.title: Crew Abandoned by Momoo
keyMoments.description: Most of the Caribou Pirates crew is pulled away by Momoo when he flees from the Straw Hats, leaving only Caribou on the Thousand Sunny.
keyMoments.significance: Separates Caribou from his crew, leaving him vulnerable.

keyMoments.title: Ship Destroyed by Kraken
keyMoments.description: When the Caribou Pirates return to rescue their captain, their ship is immediately destroyed by the Kraken.
keyMoments.significance: Effectively ends the Caribou Pirates as a functioning crew during this arc.

description: A rookie pirate crew led by the violent brothers Caribou and Coribou. Known for their brutality and religious justifications for their crimes.
reputation: Rookie pirates attempting to make a name in the New World

keyMoments.title: Defend Against Caribou Pirates
keyMoments.description: The reunited Straw Hat crew easily handles the Caribou Pirates' attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how much stronger the crew has become after the two-year timeskip.

keyMoments.title: Showcase Post-Timeskip Abilities
keyMoments.description: Multiple crew members demonstrate their new abilities: Franky's rocket launchers, Chopper's improved Guard Point, and Robin's Gigantesco Mano.
keyMoments.significance: First coordinated defense showing the crew's enhanced capabilities.

keyMoments.title: Monster Trio Prepares to Fight Kraken
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji coat themselves to battle the Kraken underwater.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the first major post-timeskip battle for the Monster Trio.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates, reunited after two years of training, travel underwater toward Fish-Man Island.
